snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain offered on Thursday to arm Kurdish forces fighting Islamist militants and refused to rule out British airstrikes in Iraq and possibly Syria.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron offers to arm Kurdish forces fighting Islamist militants and refuses to rule out British airstrikes in Iraq and possibly Syria.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain offered on Thursday to arm Kurdish forces fighting Islamist militants and refused to rule out British airstrikes in Iraq and possibly Syria.

headline.main: British Premier Offers to Expand Assistance to Kurdish Forces in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Britain: Premier Offers to Expand Assistance to Kurdish Forces in Iraq

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
